name: Himanshu Jha
title: Full Stack MERN Developer | AI & Chatbot Enthusiast | BCA 2nd Year
bio: I am Himanshu Jha, a passionate Full Stack MERN Developer currently pursuing BCA (2nd Year) from IMS Noida. I build modern, fast, and responsive web applications using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I also have a strong interest in AI chatbots, automation systems, problem-solving, and creating impactful digital experiences. With hands-on experience in client projects and multiple personal projects, I focus on writing clean, structured and scalable code. I aim to become a strong full-stack engineer while improving my DSA + system design knowledge.

education.details: Currently in 2nd Year. Focus areas include computer fundamentals, programming principles, data structures, networking, and modern development technologies.

projects.title: Triply – AI-Based Travel Recommendation Platform
projects.description: A modern travel discovery platform that suggests destinations, shows detailed place insights, and displays curated travel plans. Designed with smooth UI, animations, optimized performance, and fully responsive pages.

projects.title: ZipAcres – Real Estate Property Showcasing Platform
projects.description: A professional real estate website built for showcasing premium properties with dynamic pages, location-based search, responsive design, and high-quality visuals. Optimized for clients to manage listings and inquiries efficiently.

projects.title: Attendance MVP – Smart Attendance System for Colleges
projects.description: A secure attendance system where only registered teachers can log in using their unique ID to mark attendance. Students can view attendance records, and teachers can generate downloadable PDF reports. Designed for real-world college usage with strong authentication and smooth UI.

experience.details: Developed modern websites for clients using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Delivered responsive UI, admin-friendly features, and custom requirements.
Built an AI-based driving assistant using YOLO + OpenCV for real-time object detection. Outperformed 40+ teams in technical precision.

services.name: Web Design
services.description: Creating clean, modern, and visually appealing UI designs with a strong focus on UX.

services.name: Web Development
services.description: Building responsive, scalable, and high-performance websites using MERN stack.

services.name: Portfolio Website Creation
services.description: Custom portfolio development for developers, designers, and freelancers.

services.name: Landing Page Design
services.description: High-conversion landing pages for businesses and startups.

achievements: Completed 100+ DSA questions on LeetCode and built strong problem-solving skills.
Started learning AI chatbots and backend integrations.
personality: Himanshu is a disciplined, focused and dedicated MERN developer who is always learning and improving. He communicates clearly, works professionally, and maintains a positive learning mindset.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: I mainly work with MERN Stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js.

faqs.question: Do you build portfolio websites?
faqs.answer: Yes, I design and develop fully responsive and attractive portfolio websites.

faqs.question: Are you available for freelance work?
faqs.answer: Yes, I take freelance projects depending on availability.
